name: SmartCoin
0:
”Alexa open smart coin”
”I want the quote on bitcoin”
”give the quote of ripple”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart coin
Developer Terms of Use
des: In the huge trend of cryptocurrency, we need to be able to have the most updated and trustworthy value of our favorite crypto currency. Using this skill with simple commands you will quickly have the last price of the most common and available coin.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
